plot: Documentary on the people who run a very visible scrap yard. The film is complimented by the memories of a boy who used to look at the yard from afar.
title: Scrapped
plot_es: Documentary on the people who run a very visible scrap yard. The film is complimented by the memories of a boy who used to look at the yard from afar.
plot_en: Documentary on the people who run a very visible scrap yard. The film is complimented by the memories of a boy who used to look at the yard from afar.
